name: 林嘉彤
objective: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
schedule:
Week             Content
1.  Orientation
2.  Listening/ Speaking Unit. 1 Are First Impression Accurate?
3.  Reading Unit. 1 How do you make a first impression?
4.  Reading Unit. 1 How do you make a first impression?
5.  Listening/ Speaking Unit 2 What’s more important: taste or    nutrition?
6.  Reading Unit. 2 What makes food taste good?
7.  Reading Unit. 2 What makes food taste good?
8.  Review
9.  Midterm exam and Proficiency Test
10. Listening/ Speaking Unit 3 Can we learn from success and failure?
11. Reading Unit. 3 What does it take to be successful?
12. Listening/ Speaking Unit 4 Is change good or bad?
13. Reading Unit. 4 How has technology affected your life?
14. Listening/ Speaking Unit 5 Are we responsible for the world we live in?
15. Reading Unit. 5 Why do people help each other?
16. Reading Unit. 5 Why do people help each other?
17. Review
18. Final Exam and Proficiency Test
scorePolicy: 期中考21%,期末考28%,期中會考15%,期末會考15%,平時成績21%
